Title: Requires disclosure of certain social media terms of service
Summary: Requires social media companies to post terms of service for each social media platform owned or operated by the company in a manner reasonably designed to inform all users of the social media platform of the existence and contents of the terms of service; requires social media companies to submit to the attorney general certain terms of service reports; provides remedies for violations.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to requiring disclosure of certain social media terms of service
